sentences.en: an infection that’s resistant to antibiotics
sentences.cn: 对抗生素有抗药性的感染

sentences.en: Children's suncare products are normally water-resistant.
sentences.cn: 儿童防晒产品通常都是防水的。

sentences.en: Cotton is more resistant to being squashed and polyester is more resilient.
sentences.cn: 棉布更抗压，而涤纶更有弹性。

sentences.en: Many managers are resistant to change.
Many pests are resistant to the insecticide.
sentences.cn: 许多害虫对这种杀虫剂有抵抗力.

sentences.en: Microfibre fabrics are both water resistant and windproof.
sentences.cn: 微纤维织物既防水又防风。

sentences.en: Oiled wood is water-resistant and won't flake.
sentences.cn: 上过油的木头防水而且不会剥落。

sentences.en: plants that are resistant to disease
Scientists believe overexposure to antibiotics helps resistant bacteria become more widespread.
sentences.cn: 科学家认为,过度接触抗菌素使有抗药性的细菌的传播更广泛.

sentences.en: Some people are very resistant to the idea of exercise.
The body may be less resistant if it is cold.
sentences.cn: 天冷时，身体的抵抗力会下降。

sentences.en: The durable high-impact plastic case is water resistant to 100 feet.
sentences.cn: 这种结实的高强度塑料盒子在水下100英尺以内是防水的。

sentences.en: The majority have a built-in Luddite mentality; they are resistant to change.
sentences.cn: 大部分人天生有种反对技术进步的心理。他们抗拒变革。

sentences.en: The personal stereo has a water-resistant outer case.
sentences.cn: 这款随身听的外壳是防水的。

sentences.en: They imposed their government by force on the resistant population.
sentences.cn: 他们以武力把自己的统治强加在持反抗态度的人民头上.

sentences.en: This new type of infection is resistant to antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 这种新传染病对抗菌素有抗药力.

sentences.en: Worryingly for those in favour of competition, the Minister has been resistant to this argument.
sentences.cn: 令那些赞成竞争的人担心的是，部长始终拒绝接受这一论点。

words.tran_cn: 无抵抗力的；无法抗拒的
阻力；电阻；抵抗；反抗；抵抗力
[电] 电阻率；抵抗力；电阻系数
反对的,反抗的,无政府的

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 耐火的，耐高温的；抗火物
耐火的；防爆的；耐燃性；耐燃物
防风雨的；不受天气影响的

trans.tran_cn: 有抵抗力的，抵抗的，顽固的
trans.tran_en: not damaged or affected by something
